timeline.message:
Unwrap instances of `SSLException`

Motivation:

`SslHandler` extends `ByteToMessageDecoder` that wraps all thrown
exceptions with `DecoderException`. This complicates understanding of
the problem when users expect an instance of `SSLException`.

Modifications:

- Intercept all caught exceptions and unwrap `SSLException` if possible;

Result:

Users directly receive `SSLException`.
